name: Running out of Space (Maksim_Ivanovich)
description:
Many hundred years have passed after the nuclear war on the planet. Space stations began to fall apart! Some are combined into alliances!

The population is growing and everyone lacks the place!

Everyone becomes closely in space! And they want to escape somewhere, but there is no place.

It's time to check - is there a radiation on the planet!

But who will go to the planet?!

Control:

Bounce - Space Bar

Left - Down

Right -Up
